blog.name: ao3feed-yoonseok
blog.title: Hwagae Market
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok|J-Hope/Min Yoongi|Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Mountain Pack
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Qco4hZ

by Chimtie

Jimin sometimes missed his mother that once commanded the Mountain Herd. Areum demands were wise and provided benefits. Jimin allocated shelters, walls, and towers. These were harsh times because wolves were exhausted and sick. Then The Headman created a pact with Forest Herd that took care of ill animals.

Three autumns passed and winter was near.
Jimin’s pack needed nutritious fresh food. When they were hunting they met outsiders.
The Leader had to decide their fate.

Words: 629, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Park Jimin|Omega, Kim Taehyung|Omega, Kim Seokjin|Omega, Min Yoongi|Alpha, Min Yoonji|Alpha, Kim Namjoon|Alpha, Jeon Jeongguk|Alpha, Jung Hoseok|Beta
  • Relationships: Min Yoongi|SUGA/Park Jimin, Kim Taehyung/Jeon Jeongguk, Kim Namjoon/Kim Seokjin, Min Yoonji/Jung Hoseok
  • Additional Tags: Brothers Park Jimin/Kim Taehyung, Brothers Jeon Jeongguk/Kim Namjoon, Omegaverse, Headman Kim Namjoon, Headman Park Jimin, Romance, Enemies to Lovers, Scenting, Mating Cycles/In Heat, Slow Build, Slow Burn, Minor Character(s), Pack Dynamics, Eventual Smut


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Qco4hZ

summary:
Summary:
They say murder requires passion, emotion. Min Yoongi knows better. Murder requires money, a cold heart. It’s a...
body:
Summary:

They say murder requires passion, emotion. Min Yoongi knows better. Murder requires money, a cold heart. It’s a contract.  And Park Jimin is his latest business transaction.

<< / 90 / ?

Enjoy? ❤️

@softspearb

And now just the Epilogue left 😭

tags: this is all pretty much my real situation now
i feel like crying but what right do i have
really it hurts to be so close to him but he still hangs on to the past
I never realised how much dramas can be true until now
i just turn my pain into prompts bc why not HAHA
body:
short

Being in love with someone who still suffers from heartache of past loves hurt like hell. The world is that cruel- One person loves another who craves love but does not see that and thus believes he cannot be loved. And I keep smiling and pretend that it’s okay. But it’s not okay. I want to tell him that it’s okay to lean on me but I’m afraid that extending that arm will distant us. One part of me believes that he has feelings for me, but he comes back to me to talks about his own heartbreaks. So I don’t know. We’re still young, so I figure that it’s alright as long as it makes him happier. I’m happier too, as long as I can see him.
